markdownRemark.html:
I’m a mechanical engineer currently based in Buenos Aires, working remotely as software developer for Paygarden, an American company based in San Francisco.

Some of my current interests:

  • software development in clojure, clojurescript and elm, data intensive apps, progressive web apps
  • self development, checklists, time management, languages and learning
  • future of work
  • self funded businesses
  • container homes, campervans and functional interior design
